reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. I need to:

1. First, explore the repository structure to understand what we're working with
2. Look at the pom.xml file(s) to see the current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the Java version to 17
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if everything works
6. Fix any issues that arise
7. Keep iterating until `mvn clean verify` succeeds

Good! JDK 17 is available. Now let me start updating all the pom.xml files to migrate from Java 8 to Java 17. I'll:

1. Update the Java version from 1.8 to 17
2. Update the maven-compiler-plugin version to a more recent one that supports Java 17
3. Update all dependencies to their latest versions compatible with Java 17

Let's start with the root pom.xml:

The issue is with PowerMock trying to access Java internal APIs which are now restricted in Java 17 due to the module system. PowerMock is notoriously incompatible with Java 17. We need to configure the surefire plugin to add the necessary JVM arguments to open the required modules for testing. Let me add this configuration to the modules that use PowerMock.

Let's add the surefire configuration to the root pom:

Text replacement complete and details displayed in console.
File: /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/alexa-skills-kit-sdk-for-java/pom.xml
Replaced 1 occurrence
Old string:         <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-site-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>3.12.1</version>
        </plugin>
New string:         <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-site-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>3.12.1</version>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>3.2.2</version>
          <configuration>
            <argLine>
              --add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED
              --add-opens java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED
              --add-opens java.base/java.lang.reflect=ALL-UNNAMED
              --add-opens java.base/java.text=ALL-UNNAMED
              --add-opens java.desktop/java.awt.font=ALL-UNNAMED
            </argLine>
          </configuration>
        </plugin>
